Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the city of Oswego
Summary: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the city of Oswego; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing an occupancy tax in the city of Oswego; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
